title: The threat of nuclear war is real, top Russian official says; U.S. wants to see Moscow ‘weakened’
content:
1. The threat of nuclear war is real, top Russian official says; U.S. wants to see Moscow ‘weakened’  CNBC
  2. In escalation of rhetoric, Moscow cites 'real' risk of nuclear war  Reuters.com
  3. Russia-Ukraine war: what we know on day 62 of the invasion  The Guardian
  4. Possibility of nuclear conflict and outbreak of World War III over Ukraine is 'serious, real,' Russian Foreign Minister warns  Yahoo News
  5. Russia's Lavrov: Do not underestimate threat of nuclear war  Reuters.com
contentSnippet:
The threat of nuclear war is real, top Russian official says; U.S. wants to see Moscow ‘weakened’  CNBC
In escalation of rhetoric, Moscow cites 'real' risk of nuclear war  Reuters.com
Russia-Ukraine war: what we know on day 62 of the invasion  The Guardian
Possibility of nuclear conflict and outbreak of World War III over Ukraine is 'serious, real,' Russian Foreign Minister warns  Yahoo News
